com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core

Class MultiWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.DataEndpoint
      • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.DataWriter
        • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.MultiWriter

  • public class MultiWriter
extends DataWriter
    Writes records to multiple DataWriter.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MultiWriter.AvailableCapacityWriteStrategy
      Writes each record to a single writer by choosing the one with the highest available capacity (DataWriter.available() If all writers have identical capacities, this strategy behaves like MultiWriter.RoundRobinWriteStrategy and writes to each writer in turn.
      static class  MultiWriter.ReplicateWriteStrategy
      Writes each record to all writers.
      static class  MultiWriter.RoundRobinWriteStrategy
      Divides records evenly between all writers by cycling through the list and writing each record to a single writer in turn.
      static class  MultiWriter.WriteStrategy 

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.DataEndpoint

        DataEndpoint.State
